extendedInfo.description: Every day Joel McHale and The Soup crew overload their TiVos with the strange, obscure, and totally unbelievable moments in pop culture, celebrity news, and reality TV. Then they take a nap. But right after that they add a heaping helping of humor and serve up everything you need to know about the entertainment world.Â· Access to exclusive digital content not seen in the showÂ· New show clips to keep you up to date on all things Joel and The SoupÂ· The âHall of Fameâ lets you relive the funniest moments from The Soup any time, featuring classic clips not available anywhere else like Spaghetti Cat and Stains the Dog.Â· Funny videos, photos and tweets from around the webâ¦also known as doing our part to help kill American productivity one post at a time.So grab a heaping serving of The Soup app to make sure youâre not missing the funniest takes on reality TV dramas, "Oh-no-they-didn't" talk show outbursts, and celebrity outrageousness.

reviews.title: Crappy ads
reviews.comment: Get rid of that god awful Pepsi add and make sure the videos work.  I get thru the ad then it fails to load the video I was trying to watch.  Typical comcast suckage
reviews.author: marketor menow

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Good app, just needs a bit more content, but never have issues with it.
reviews.author: Susana Sanchez

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.comment: It never loads.
reviews.author: Lindy Mejia

reviews.title: Too many commercials
reviews.comment: Love, love, love the soup, but way. Too many commercials. The commercials are longer than the videos, and each clip requires you watch one of the commercials. Would rather pay and loose the commercials.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay App. AD Block a must.
reviews.comment: Could be way better. Needs more videos and full episodes. To many ads. If you\'re rooted then download adobe block from the play store.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: I try to watch the clips and I can see the commercials then I get sound for the videos and a white screen only.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Xoom Wifi 4.1.1
reviews.comment: Love The Soup and Joel, please bring more Android content!  Please continue developing improvements in server response time and format issues for tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome add on for the show.
reviews.comment: I understand commercials from a free app, and they aren\'t very long here.  It would be a good feature if a clip is less than ten seconds and you watch it immediately again if the ad function could be automatically skipped like every other time.  Great archive though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: <3 the soup ... too bad this app sucks. wont open at all ... too many ads. get it right and ill reinstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE The Soup, HATE this app!!!
reviews.comment: You hold vids I want to watch hostage to force me to sit through commercials, I thought you guys were better than that......I guess not, sell an app for a dollar and cut the ads out of this......we\'ll pay!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish It would Work
reviews.comment: I love the show I watch it on tv. But i downloaded the app and it doeesnt work? i click on the app and it just turns black for a sec. then takes me to my mainpage. I\'m giving it a three just because i like the show..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Noo
reviews.comment: All that comes up is the title screen. Uninstalling immediately, what a disappointment!
reviews.author: iana wi

reviews.title: The only problem is that its a bit slow loading the videos.
reviews.comment: Love the show and this app is a little slow but besides that it\'s a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good laughs
reviews.comment: Its great but some video clips aren\'t able to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Videos don\'t play
reviews.comment: Love the soup, but your app not so much, The videos don\'t play. I have the Google nexus 7, I hope you can help with the problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work on my Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app. Every video clip in Latest category displays the same msg. \"Can\'t play media.\"  What\'s the use of an app that doesn\'t work? I am now deleting it. Too bad too because The Soup is a good TV program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible ad factory
reviews.comment: 30 second ad before EVERY SINGLE CLIP.  Sometimes the ad is longer than the clip\' Uninstalled!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Silly
reviews.comment: But fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor connection
reviews.comment: Refused to play any skits
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yea!
reviews.comment: Best App EVER! I love joel, and it is so fun to be able to watch clips from the show whenever I want!
reviews.author: A Google User
